column4: I think i'm gonna need some software to do this automatically for me because i'm on a dynamic IP
Can anybody recommend some internet sharing software to me please?
How do I use linux as a router
what have you got working so far? Do you have dnsmasq ipmasq installed?
and I was told thats what I needed
it shouldn't matter if you have a dynamic ip. Set the dns server on the machines you wish to server as 192.168.0.1 (or what ever the local ip is for that machin)
what is the problem. Are the other machines recieving an ip from the server?
